dataType.name: Matrix3x3
dataType.description: Matrix3x3 is data type for 3-D transformation matrices. It inherits an optional unit from Matrix that allows for a change in units between native and target values. If unit is absent targetValue SHALL retain the units of the nativeValue.

dataType.name: Matrix
dataType.description: Matrix is the abstract parent data type for 2-D and 3-D transformation matrices. It contains an optional unit that allows for a change in units between native and target values. If unit is absent targetValue SHALL retain the units of the nativeValue.

attribute.name: unit
attribute.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

objectType.name: TransformMatrix2D
objectType.description: CD-matrix transformation: targetVector = cdMatrix . nativeVector (scale and rotate)

attribute.name: cdMatrix
attribute.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

objectType.name: FrameTransform
objectType.description: This mapping class provides a transformation from the nativeFrame to the targetFrame. The transform is specified by one or more Xform objects. The Xform objects specify atomic transform operations and may be chained together (in a specific order) to define more complicated transformations. naxes specifies the dimensionality of the transformation and should reflect the dimensionality of the native and target frames.

attribute.name: naxes
attribute.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

composition.name: transform
composition.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

reference.name: nativeFrame
reference.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

reference.name: targetFrame
reference.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

objectType.name: Scale2D
objectType.description: Simple 2-dimensional scaling: vector elements targetValue[i] = scale[i] * nativeValue[i]

attribute.name: scale
attribute.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

objectType.name: Xlate1D
objectType.description: Simple 1-dimensional translation: targetValue = nativeValue - nativeRefVal.

objectType.name: Xlate2D
objectType.description: Simple 2-dimensional translation: vector targetValue = nativeValue - nativeRefVal.

objectType.name: Xlate3D
objectType.description: Simple 3-dimensional translation: vector targetValue = nativeValue - nativeRefVal.

objectType.name: Scale3D
objectType.description: Simple 3-dimensional scaling: vector elements targetValue[i] = scale[i] * nativeValue[i]

objectType.name: EnumScalar
objectType.description: For enumerated coordinates EnumScalar contains the list of enumerated values in EnumElement1 that provide the target values for each of the native values. The number of EnumElement1 in the composition needs to equal the number of native elements.

composition.name: enum
composition.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

objectType.name: Enum2D
objectType.description: For enumerated coordinates Enum2D contains the list of enumerated values in EnumElement2 that provide the target values for each of the native values. The number of EnumElement2 in the composition needs to equal the number of native elements.

composition.name: enum
composition.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

objectType.name: Enum3D
objectType.description: For enumerated coordinates Enum3D contains the list of enumerated values in EnumElement3 that provide the target values for each of the native values. The number of EnumElement3 in the composition needs to equal the number of native elements.

composition.name: enum
composition.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

objectType.name: PolFrameTransform
objectType.description: Polarization mappings are a special case of enumerated transformations, since Polarization is by definition an enumerated (scalar) coordinate. This is the abstract class.

objectType.name: Polynomial2D
objectType.description: 2-dimensional to 1-dimensional polynomial transformation: targetValue = sum (value[i] * nativeValue[1]**order1[i] * nativeValue[2]**order2[i]), where the scalars and exponents are provided by the PolyCoeff2D objects.

composition.name: coeff
composition.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

objectType.name: Polynomial1D
objectType.description: 1-dimensional polynomial transformation: targetValue = sum (value[i] * nativeValue**order[i]), where the scalars and exponents are provided by the PolyCoeff1D objects.

composition.name: coeff
composition.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

objectType.name: Xform
objectType.description: The abstract Xform class. At the next level it is split into subclasses for 1-, 2-, and 3-dimensional transforms.

attribute.name: naxes

objectType.name: Xform1D
objectType.description: The abstract class for atomic 1-dimensional transformations.

objectType.name: Xform2D
objectType.description: The abstract class for atomic 2-dimensional transformations.

objectType.name: Rotate2D
objectType.description: Simple 2-dimensional rotation in degrees CCW.

attribute.name: rotationAngle

objectType.name: Xform3D
objectType.description: The abstract class for atomic 3-dimensional transformations.

objectType.name: Rotate3D
objectType.description: Simple 3-dimensional rotation in degrees. The first rotation angle indicates CCW rotation along the Z-axis, the second CCW rotation around the X-axis.

attribute.name: rotationAngles
attribute.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

objectType.name: Projection1D
objectType.description: The attribute projection specifies a specific standard projection transformation. One should keep in mind that most of the values of the enumeration literal Projection are intended for 2-dimensional spherical coordinate frames.
